item.title: Phenylalanine - hallucinate
item.dc:creator: phenylalanine
item.description:
Err… perhaps I got a little too crazy with editing this track…?
It’s a good thing I like weird music.
I’ll keep trying…

https://soundcloud.com/phenylalaninemusic/hallucinate-3

Read full topic

item.title: Phenylalanine - hallucinate
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Louder yes, the sounds you used are totally fine!

Just would want to do something to build and release tension. Usually another melody, dropping out certain instruments and introducing others etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Phenylalanine - hallucinate
item.dc:creator: phenylalanine
item.description:
Thank you!
I will try adding in an additional melody and increasing the volume of the drums.

Read full topic

item.title: Phenylalanine - hallucinate
item.dc:creator: EVERANGE
item.description:
It’s got a nice calm and quiet feel to it, but I agree with @iammane, it needs another melody or counter melody and perhaps a bass instrument would give your song a better direction. I also think the drums need to be louder.

Read full topic

item.title: Phenylalanine - hallucinate
item.dc:creator: phenylalanine
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback!
I’m not really sure how to add another melody, but I’ll give it a try.
When you say the drums should be more prominent, do you mean louder or different tone?

Thanks again!

Read full topic

item.title: Phenylalanine - hallucinate
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
It’s got a good groove. Another melody or counter melody would help. The drums fit the pace very well I wish they were a little more prominent. I think for the length it’s not repetitive, it’s got this Dr’s office waiting room vibe to me lol. That’s not a bad thing it’s cool.

Keep at it! Looking forward to hearing more

Read full topic
